GULF OF GUINEA.
NIGERIA.
DNC 01.
1. M/V ATTACKED IN 03-58.6N 005-28.6E AT 051024Z FEB.
   VESSELS ARE ADVISED TO KEEP CLEAR OF THIS AREA
   POSITION AND TO EXERCISE EXTREME CAUTION.
   REPORTS TO MDAT-GOG, PHONE: 332 9822 8888,
   EMAIL: WATCHKEEPERS@MDAT-GOG.ORG.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 121248Z FEB 17.
